title: Policy support being stepped up
text:
TAKE A FREE TRIAL

Registered users can read up to 3 reports. Enter your details below for immediate access. If you would like to request a full trial of our services, please fill in the trial request form instead.

Note our system only accepts work email addresses (e.g. no Gmail, etc.).

The password for your account must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one number, one capital letter and one of the following special characters (between double quotes): " !"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@[\]^_`{|}~".

og.title: Policy support being stepped up - Capital Economics
og.description: With economic growth across the region collapsing, policy support is being ramped up aggressively. Having slashed interest rates over the past couple of weeks, central banks have begun to unveil a series of unconventional policy measures to support activity and ease strains in the financial markets. In the Philippines, the central bank has announced that … Continue reading "Policy support being stepped up"
